name: Custom Recipe Book
description:
Make your own custom recipe book! This is great for folks who may be creating their own recipes but don't have a great way to store all the information. I plan on printing this out eventually on A4 paper.


This design is largely inspired and tweaked by Blue Apron's current design for their recipe cards. I've really enjoyed using their service during quarantine to try out new recipes. #notsponsored ðŸ¤£


Feel free to share this with a loved one who's gotten really into quarantine cooking, or customize the components! Would love to see how folks might remix this!
